message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit higher than I was expecting. I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me in the middle at $100?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous offer, so how about $105?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $115?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $108, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me there?
I can see you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $110, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $107, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. Can you meet me there?
I've already met you at $110, Bob, and you rejected it. I'm not willing to go any lower than that. If you're still interested, I'm willing to meet you at the same price of $110.

I appreciate the negotiation, Alice, but I'm really at my limit. I'm willing to meet you at $108, and that's as high as I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider buying from John for $80.
